def_cn: 克里奥尔语(某些地方通用的混合语)
def_en: A creole is a language that has developed from a mixture of different languages and has become the main language in a particular place

def_cn: 克里奥尔人(指居住在西印度群岛的非洲人和欧洲人的混血儿)
def_en: A Creole is a person of mixed African and European race, who lives in the West Indies and speaks a creole language.

def_cn: 克里奥尔人(指首批定居在西印度群岛或美国南部的欧洲人的后裔)
def_en: A Creole is a person descended from the Europeans who first settled in the West Indies or the southern United States of America.

def_cn: 克里奥尔的;克里奥尔人的
def_en: Creole means belonging to or relating to the Creole community.
